siteMetadata.title: Medical Student COVID-19 Action Network
siteMetadata.description: The Medical Student COVID-19 Action Network (MSCAN) is here to present all COVID-19 service opportunities organized by U.S. medical schools. Our goal is to set an example for the nation as medical students, help displaced students serve from home, alleviate the existing burden on the healthcare system, combine resources, support medical workers, and promote the exchange of ideas.
siteMetadata.author: Public Health Coalition
